lead_paragraph: WAGMAN--Fredrica Barris, on January 27, 2016. Beloved mother of Joel, James, Nela, Mary, and the late Nancy, and beloved wife of the late Howard Wagman. Mother- in-law to Mina, Anne Landsman, and Steven Wein, sister of Chuck and sister-in-law Mary Barris. Author of five published novels, numerous stories-unique, creative, talented and loving, she will be greatly missed by family and cherished friends. With her husband Howard, in Philadelphia, she was a founding member of the Juvenile Diabetes Research Foundation, and an active supporter of Project HOME. Graveside services will be held at Roosevelt Memorial Park, Friday at 2:15pm, after which family and friends will be welcome at the home of Joel Wagman. www.levinefuneral.com 1/3
